@Sumo_x2 Even if you find NTR dumb, in my life I have seen many cases in my circle similar as this and even with myself. After break/hook up its kind of easy to ask for benefits. I slept with her few times during High School then she married early. Now after 9 years, we were casually chatting when she started to blame her husband for lack creativity during sex. I took that as a signal and ask for fun ride and woah I got that pussy again. Now after year I knew that she slept with other two of my classmates as well. she even introduce one of her married friend who think that her husband is cheating on her. So IMO it's not totally frictional as there are girls who are easy or you are on right time there!
@noobeginner just chill ppl have a right to hate stuff and they have every right to hate this story it is in fact really bad and so lame. Just let ut bother u too much just enjoying ur NTR.

@weird ass hentai addict I agree kink shaming succs but at the same time ppl are gonna voice their opinions and they have every right to do so and most of the time those opinions are sound. MOST NTR stories are dumb and that's how it is you really have to look for a decent NTR story. The same ol story, bland characters, and same dumb scenarios are abundant in the usual NTR stories and personally that's why I can't take NTR srsly cuz their stories are dumb and I just end up laughing like this story. She had no reason to cheat and he was coming on a bit rapey but she didn't resist and then she's all of a sudden a damn expert lol it's weak so that final line she said makes even more sense both in and out of the story lol.

tbh I'm gonna have to agree with noobeginner even though I don't particularly like ntr, he makes a good point about how a lot of people are toxic towards the genre and anyone who enjoys it, just let people beat to whatever they like

@noobeginner well sometimes people get triggered because they feel bad for the character. I mean its not wrong for people to voice out their opinions its just how we are viewing them. Its like reading a novel or manga or book and it makes you cry. Yes its hentai and yes its okay to hate something. You probably don't have any feelings because you are just some lonely shithead but that's okay
